title: Bones (Ape Atoll)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Skeletal gorilla bones are dropped by the skeletal gorillas in the Ape Atoll Dungeon. Unlike regular bones, if these are left on the ground for too long, another skeletal gorilla will emerge from them and begin attacking any nearby players. If there are too many skeletal gorillas already spawned, they instead turn into "burning bones", which cannot be picked up. In addition, they cannot be turned into a greegree.

Item ID3187

Skeletal gorilla bones are dropped by the skeletal gorillas in the Ape Atoll Dungeon. Unlike regular bones, if these are left on the ground for too long, another skeletal gorilla will emerge from them and begin attacking any nearby players. If there are too many skeletal gorillas already spawned, they instead turn into "burning bones", which cannot be picked up. In addition, they cannot be turned into a greegree.

When players leave the dungeon with them in your inventory, a message will appear in the chatbox stating that "The skeleton bones you are carrying crumble to dust", and they turn into ashes. However, they can be safely smuggled out via dying and reclaiming the items from Death.

Skeletal gorilla bones give 3 Prayer experience when buried, much like standard monkey bones. This can be increased by offering the bones in different ways:

  • 9 XP when casting Sinister Offering.
  • 9 XP when offered at the Sacred Bone Burner after the appropriate faith level has been achieved.
  • 10.5 XP when offered at a gilded altar with two burners lit or at the Chaos Temple.
  • 12 XP when offered at the Ectofuntus in the form of skeleton bonemeal.

[[File:Bones (Ape Atoll) detail.png|130px|left]]
'''Skeletal gorilla bones''' are dropped by the [[Skeleton (Ape Atoll)|skeletal gorillas]] in the [[Ape Atoll Dungeon]]. Unlike [[Bones|regular bones]], if these are left on the ground for too long, another skeletal gorilla will emerge from them and begin attacking any nearby players. If there are too many skeletal gorillas already spawned, they instead turn into "burning bones", which cannot be picked up. In addition, they cannot be turned into a [[greegree]].

When players leave the dungeon with them in your inventory, a message will appear in the chatbox stating that "The skeleton bones you are carrying crumble to dust", and they turn into [[ashes]]. However, they can be safely smuggled out via [[dying]] and reclaiming the items from [[Death (NPC)|Death]].

Skeletal gorilla bones give 3 [[Prayer]] experience when buried, much like standard [[monkey bones]]. This can be increased by offering the bones in different ways: 
* 9 XP when casting [[Sinister Offering]].
* 9 XP when offered at the [[Sacred Bone Burner]] after the appropriate faith level has been achieved.
* 10.5 XP when offered at a [[gilded altar]] with two burners lit or at the [[Chaos Temple (hut)|Chaos Temple]].
* 12 XP when offered at the [[Ectofuntus]] in the form of [[skeleton bonemeal]].
